channel.title: Can anyone fix this?

item.title: Can anyone fix this?
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

nice one ron this one looks way better than mine thanks and right after when i finish my second last post here(counting this one) i started to edit my auto clicker and now it works ok i’ve added some new reports here’s the code what do u think of it? any feedbacks? this auto clicker might work if you have firefox in the shortcut icon section on the button letf hand corner of ur windows. here’s the code plz leave feedbacks/modifications. thx.

[code]program BTDownloadClicker;
{.include library2.txt}
var a,rx,ry,x1,y1,bitcomet,time:integer;

procedure load;
begin
bitcomet := BitmapFromString(16, 16, ‘z78DA9594598E1C390C44’ +
‘AFA495CBA7B8DDFF480E166606D3B0D1B6B3015543493D0683548’ +
‘EF1DD53C3AF45490CD7F2B038F5DCFDD47CFE461C518EF1974F2D’ +
‘672BD022A4B2A84EFDFC4431DE589057AD377478F1A1F31B32B9F’ +
‘8C0D9954DD835BFF0B31C7F59AF3AAFE13732B3D797B7B6998D20’ +
‘BAF757E469F2701EF186F8FAAC865359339BB9F23F7206F623391’ +
‘01315B71CC619CE4A82E3D3D8FDC2BA2F7CF36382533887754413’ +
‘28C0CC17501EEA1B7C464D0871AF707AE7A37C94DBD6852C07A1D’ +
‘EB5A4CAA57FFA02005A07B7B39958E10F689FFFDD400B7433FD81’ +
‘96A80B6B98C3377BD24AB62772E9837E6C1874CEC785AC212ED7C’ +
‘EAAFD96C4A79B20BBD90479D86ACD06FD3E05599C155EE5F96474’ +
‘7BE0A3D0CFFEC03EB54B1A173D1143BB5048EC1817E98B8569955’ +
‘9BEAE74C92A18ABCD2FEB46ACDB1C97FAF07B3F3A3B46076F5F5D’ +
‘F06BA02ED73C017E1E2AD64523164FEC6C9E3B4B450E66420B1AC’ +
‘284A13C9642EDD3CD1F7EEB5C46CD7FBD3369367F07F6355ADBA4’ +
‘5DAA8A8C87E608349C483278A10AE2B308D9657724BA03AF2EC3E’ +
‘D97ABF52314E4A7200709FCF1013D6173B79F8C0EC20196123D67’ +
‘166A1ECB27DBF538B45720238F2A118C31228D37B2E8C584BC0E0’ +
‘EDFA814648627818ADBC3DD3DCD89DE7D94A8291574E6947C37C6’ +
‘D479EFB67FA70815BD3AFCA64243A1227DB4BCECBD895C3E774FF’ +
‘B836FB8D590D23B076F6D2E44E6C1DD7CF7E0CE908FE1EBEEF1FE’ +
‘3FFFB128370AE63BB9AE2E78C2EA0BAADE1AE80BDC003318CA1D7’ +
‘7B4E77021E3333917E4BD0916F2C42C43396CA279F4E75B1C46A8’ +
‘3793EFC04D92D55F0C3D834A5E206527DCF8BE8DADCDC4DB8B666’ +
‘E9013979C9897EAB973E6F75F21CC556C49611EABA61CAC0B624E’ +
‘1D7DF0702BF53750E798D9E3B030A93C5482EED76FC29F3CAEB2C’ +
‘EF584318A1515B50D434CF9AE00930E7D4FF801780C6358’);
end;

procedure FindBitcomet;
begin
if(findBitmap(bitcomet,rx,ry))then
begin
mouse(rx,ry,x1,y1,true);
wait(75);
mouse(rx,ry,x1,y1,true);
wait(600);
mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
wait(300);
mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
wait(300);
mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
wait(300);
mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
wait(300);
mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50))
end else
begin
writeln(‘Problem With The BitMap or something related to the BitMap’);
end;
end;

begin
load;
a:= 0;
time:= 0;
repeat
wait(58125);
time:= time +1;
a:= a + 1;
FindBitcomet;
cleardebug;
writeln(‘Worked For: ‘+ inttostr(time)+’ mins!’);
writeln('moved mouse: ‘+ inttostr(a 5)+’ Random times.’);
writeln('Clicked On Bitcomet: ’ + inttostr(a2)+ ’ times!’);
until(false);
end.
[/code]

item.title: Can anyone fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Here is the code that works:

program BitCometClicker;

{.include library2.txt}

var a,rx,ry,x1,y1,BitComet:integer;

begin
a:= 1;
bitcomet := BitmapFromString(16, 16, 'z78DA9594598E1C390C44' +
       'AFA495CBA7B8DDFF480E166606D3B0D1B6B3015543493D0683548' +
       'EF1DD53C3AF45490CD7F2B038F5DCFDD47CFE461C518EF1974F2D' +
       '672BD022A4B2A84EFDFC4431DE589057AD377478F1A1F31B32B9F' +
       '8C0D9954DD835BFF0B31C7F59AF3AAFE13732B3D797B7B6998D20' +
       'BAF757E469F2701EF186F8FAAC865359339BB9F23F7206F623391' +
       '01315B71CC619CE4A82E3D3D8FDC2BA2F7CF36382533887754413' +
       '28C0CC17501EEA1B7C464D0871AF707AE7A37C94DBD6852C07A1D' +
       'EB5A4CAA57FFA02005A07B7B39958E10F689FFFDD400B7433FD81' +
       '96A80B6B98C3377BD24AB62772E9837E6C1874CEC785AC212ED7C' +
       'EAAFD96C4A79B20BBD90479D86ACD06FD3E05599C155EE5F96474' +
       '7BE0A3D0CFFEC03EB54B1A173D1143BB5048EC1817E98B8569955' +
       '9BEAE74C92A18ABCD2FEB46ACDB1C97FAF07B3F3A3B46076F5F5D' +
       'F06BA02ED73C017E1E2AD64523164FEC6C9E3B4B450E66420B1AC' +
       '284A13C9642EDD3CD1F7EEB5C46CD7FBD3369367F07F6355ADBA4' +
       '5DAA8A8C87E608349C483278A10AE2B308D9657724BA03AF2EC3E' +
       'D97ABF52314E4A7200709FCF1013D6173B79F8C0EC20196123D67' +
       '166A1ECB27DBF538B45720238F2A118C31228D37B2E8C584BC0E0' +
       'EDFA814648627818ADBC3DD3DCD89DE7D94A8291574E6947C37C6' +
       'D479EFB67FA70815BD3AFCA64243A1227DB4BCECBD895C3E774FF' +
       'B836FB8D590D23B076F6D2E44E6C1DD7CF7E0CE908FE1EBEEF1FE' +
       '3FFFB128370AE63BB9AE2E78C2EA0BAADE1AE80BDC003318CA1D7' +
       '7B4E77021E3333917E4BD0916F2C42C43396CA279F4E75B1C46A8' +
       '3793EFC04D92D55F0C3D834A5E206527DCF8BE8DADCDC4DB8B666' +
       'E9013979C9897EAB973E6F75F21CC556C49611EABA61CAC0B624E' +
       '1D7DF0702BF53750E798D9E3B030A93C5482EED76FC29F3CAEB2C' +
       'EF584318A1515B50D434CF9AE00930E7D4FF801780C6358');

repeat
  if(findbitmap(bitcomet,x,y))then
  wait(random(60000));
  mouse(rx,ry,x1,y1,true);
  wait(random(500)+ 200);
  mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
  wait(250+ random(300));
  mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
  wait(250+ random(300));
  mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
  wait(250+ random(300));
  mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50));
  wait(250+ random(300));
  a:= a + 1;
  If (a>0) Then
   cleardebug;
  writeln('moved mouse: '+ inttostr(a)+' times.');
 until(false);
end.

Here is my version of your script made better. :

Program BitCometClicker;

{.include library2.txt}

Var
   a, rx, ry, x1, y1, BitComet : Integer;

// Procedure to load all the bitmaps.
Procedure LoadBitmaps;
Begin
  BitComet := BitmapFromString(16, 16, 'z78DA9594598E1C390C44' +
       'AFA495CBA7B8DDFF480E166606D3B0D1B6B3015543493D0683548' +
       'EF1DD53C3AF45490CD7F2B038F5DCFDD47CFE461C518EF1974F2D' +
       '672BD022A4B2A84EFDFC4431DE589057AD377478F1A1F31B32B9F' +
       '8C0D9954DD835BFF0B31C7F59AF3AAFE13732B3D797B7B6998D20' +
       'BAF757E469F2701EF186F8FAAC865359339BB9F23F7206F623391' +
       '01315B71CC619CE4A82E3D3D8FDC2BA2F7CF36382533887754413' +
       '28C0CC17501EEA1B7C464D0871AF707AE7A37C94DBD6852C07A1D' +
       'EB5A4CAA57FFA02005A07B7B39958E10F689FFFDD400B7433FD81' +
       '96A80B6B98C3377BD24AB62772E9837E6C1874CEC785AC212ED7C' +
       'EAAFD96C4A79B20BBD90479D86ACD06FD3E05599C155EE5F96474' +
       '7BE0A3D0CFFEC03EB54B1A173D1143BB5048EC1817E98B8569955' +
       '9BEAE74C92A18ABCD2FEB46ACDB1C97FAF07B3F3A3B46076F5F5D' +
       'F06BA02ED73C017E1E2AD64523164FEC6C9E3B4B450E66420B1AC' +
       '284A13C9642EDD3CD1F7EEB5C46CD7FBD3369367F07F6355ADBA4' +
       '5DAA8A8C87E608349C483278A10AE2B308D9657724BA03AF2EC3E' +
       'D97ABF52314E4A7200709FCF1013D6173B79F8C0EC20196123D67' +
       '166A1ECB27DBF538B45720238F2A118C31228D37B2E8C584BC0E0' +
       'EDFA814648627818ADBC3DD3DCD89DE7D94A8291574E6947C37C6' +
       'D479EFB67FA70815BD3AFCA64243A1227DB4BCECBD895C3E774FF' +
       'B836FB8D590D23B076F6D2E44E6C1DD7CF7E0CE908FE1EBEEF1FE' +
       '3FFFB128370AE63BB9AE2E78C2EA0BAADE1AE80BDC003318CA1D7' +
       '7B4E77021E3333917E4BD0916F2C42C43396CA279F4E75B1C46A8' +
       '3793EFC04D92D55F0C3D834A5E206527DCF8BE8DADCDC4DB8B666' +
       'E9013979C9897EAB973E6F75F21CC556C49611EABA61CAC0B624E' +
       '1D7DF0702BF53750E798D9E3B030A93C5482EED76FC29F3CAEB2C' +
       'EF584318A1515B50D434CF9AE00930E7D4FF801780C6358');
End;

Begin
 a := 1;
 
 // Load all the bitmaps.
 LoadBitmaps;

 Repeat
  If(findbitmap(BitComet,x,y))Then
  Begin
   Wait(Random(60000));
  End;
  Mouse(rx,ry,x1,y1,true);
  Wait(Random(500) + 200);
  MMouse(Random(1000),Random(500),Random(50),Random(50));
  Wait(250 + Random(300));
  MMouse(Random(1000),Random(500),Random(50),Random(50));
  Wait(250 + Random(300));
  MMouse(Random(1000),Random(500),Random(50),Random(50));
  Wait(250 + Random(300));
  MMouse(Random(1000),Random(500),Random(50),Random(50));
  a := a + 5;
  Wait(250 + Random(300));
  If (a > 0) Then
  Begin
   Cleardebug;
  End;
  WriteLn('Moved Mouse: '+ inttostr(a)+' times.');
 Until(False);
 FreeBitmap(BitComet);
End.

~Ron

item.title: Can anyone fix this?
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

yes i’ve changed that and now i’ve the type dismatch, so how do u change that? i’ve having someproblem with the statments. GrRrrr… okey thanx anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

You forgot to declare the Bitmap in FindBitmap.

It should be:

repeat if(findbitmap(bitcomet,x,y))then wait(random(60000));
on line 32+ instead.

You will encounter a future error, type mismatch in script. This is because you are asking the script while the mouse is moving do… However, you cannot do that, because MMouse is a procedure, and does not return to true, or false.

Hope I helped,
Cheesehunk.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone fix this?
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

can anyone fix this problem i’m having in this script? it’s an auto bitcomet clicker it clicks on bitcomet every 1min so that the computer wouldn’t set to sleep. but then their’s the invalid premeter problem dont know why. their’s something wrong with the if…then’s i dont know whats the problem. so could someone plz help here’s the code.

program New; {.include library2.txt} var a,rx,ry,x1,y1,BitComet:integer; begin a:= 1 bitcomet := BitmapFromString(16, 16, 'z78DA9594598E1C390C44' + 'AFA495CBA7B8DDFF480E166606D3B0D1B6B3015543493D0683548' + 'EF1DD53C3AF45490CD7F2B038F5DCFDD47CFE461C518EF1974F2D' + '672BD022A4B2A84EFDFC4431DE589057AD377478F1A1F31B32B9F' + '8C0D9954DD835BFF0B31C7F59AF3AAFE13732B3D797B7B6998D20' + 'BAF757E469F2701EF186F8FAAC865359339BB9F23F7206F623391' + '01315B71CC619CE4A82E3D3D8FDC2BA2F7CF36382533887754413' + '28C0CC17501EEA1B7C464D0871AF707AE7A37C94DBD6852C07A1D' + 'EB5A4CAA57FFA02005A07B7B39958E10F689FFFDD400B7433FD81' + '96A80B6B98C3377BD24AB62772E9837E6C1874CEC785AC212ED7C' + 'EAAFD96C4A79B20BBD90479D86ACD06FD3E05599C155EE5F96474' + '7BE0A3D0CFFEC03EB54B1A173D1143BB5048EC1817E98B8569955' + '9BEAE74C92A18ABCD2FEB46ACDB1C97FAF07B3F3A3B46076F5F5D' + 'F06BA02ED73C017E1E2AD64523164FEC6C9E3B4B450E66420B1AC' + '284A13C9642EDD3CD1F7EEB5C46CD7FBD3369367F07F6355ADBA4' + '5DAA8A8C87E608349C483278A10AE2B308D9657724BA03AF2EC3E' + 'D97ABF52314E4A7200709FCF1013D6173B79F8C0EC20196123D67' + '166A1ECB27DBF538B45720238F2A118C31228D37B2E8C584BC0E0' + 'EDFA814648627818ADBC3DD3DCD89DE7D94A8291574E6947C37C6' + 'D479EFB67FA70815BD3AFCA64243A1227DB4BCECBD895C3E774FF' + 'B836FB8D590D23B076F6D2E44E6C1DD7CF7E0CE908FE1EBEEF1FE' + '3FFFB128370AE63BB9AE2E78C2EA0BAADE1AE80BDC003318CA1D7' + '7B4E77021E3333917E4BD0916F2C42C43396CA279F4E75B1C46A8' + '3793EFC04D92D55F0C3D834A5E206527DCF8BE8DADCDC4DB8B666' + 'E9013979C9897EAB973E6F75F21CC556C49611EABA61CAC0B624E' + '1D7DF0702BF53750E798D9E3B030A93C5482EED76FC29F3CAEB2C' + 'EF584318A1515B50D434CF9AE00930E7D4FF801780C6358'); repeat if(findbitmap(x,y))then wait(random(60000)); mouse(rx,ry,x1,y1,true); wait(random(500)+ 200); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(250+ random(300)); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(250+ random(300)); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(250+ random(300)); mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)); wait(250+ random(300)); while(mmouse(random(1000),random(500),random(50),random(50)))do a:= a + 1; for(a>0)do cleardebug; writeln('moved mouse: '+ inttostr(a)+' times.'); until(false); end.

Read full topic
